description: [Daggerfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1034) used [Reg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0075) to dump the Security Account Manager (SAM) hive from victim machines for follow-on credential extraction.(Citation: Symantec Daggerfly 2023)

external_references.description: Threat Hunter Team. (2023, April 20). Daggerfly: APT Actor Targets Telecoms Company in Africa. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
